synopsis.text: To escape the shackles of eternal life, Manji, a once cold-hearted swordsman, embarks on a mission to slay a thousand wicked men, a task set forth by the ancient nun who cursed him with immortality. As he traverses through feudal Japan, he encounters Rin, a young girl thirsting for vengeance against the ruthless sword school that brutally murdered her family. Despite his initial reluctance, Manji agrees to protect Rin and aid her in her quest for retribution, all while chasing his own redemption. Together, they must navigate a treacherous path filled with relentless adversaries, constantly challenging Manji's immortal limits and pushing him to the brink in this thrilling tale of vengeance, atonement, and the pursuit of a long-lost peace.
